channel.title: Want log in 508 mezzyscape source and base!
channel.description: I am starting to make my first rsps, i dont know how to work with it and have took 2 hours just to get v3.5 mezzyscape soure and client to work, i am happy that it works now. The issues im having is that when i log in its fine, but when i log out and try to log back in, i cant, it says incorrect passwork, i opened the folder with accounts and passworks instead of my passwork asdqwe, its now 13552746? Why does my password change, i want it to stay the same, i used 5 other accounts and it changes, why, why does it change when i log out, if you can help me with my 508 please reply!!! Also how do i make my self owner! Thanks!

item.title: Want log in 508 mezzyscape source and base!
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

This is directed at the people with rep of 11+ Obviously no one understands this concept of useng WORDPAD ( right click the character file and open with… WORDPAD )

@OP sorry dont mean it to come off as me being an ass.

Read full topic

Google, “removing MD5 hash on 508” or something to that effect.

item.title: Want log in 508 mezzyscape source and base!
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

The way you make yourself owner is change your player rights from 0 to 3. (4 = hidden admin, 3 = owner, 2 = admin, 1 = mod.)

But, when you said you see your passes are changing to numbers, thats just codding so the comp can understand it…

Read full topic
item.source: Want log in 508 mezzyscape source and base!
